headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SILBERMANN, CANTOR KURT

snippet: SILBERMANN--Cantor Kurt. The Cantors Assembly, with profound sadness, notes the passing of its beloved past president, Hazzan Kurt Silbermann. Born in Munich, Germany, immediately after Kristallnacht, he and his family fled for the United States when the cantorial school at which he had been studying was closed. Once Hebrew Union College opened its cantorial school in New York, Kurt auditioned and was accepted into its first class. Possessing a most beautiful baritone voice, he served Temple Emanu-El of Englewood, NJ, for over 30 years, many of them alongside side noted rabbi, Arthur Hertzberg. We extend our deepest condolences to his wife, Inge and daughter, Judy and to their extended family. Hazzan Alberto Mizrahi, President Hazzan Stephen J. Stein, Executive Vice President 1/3
